name: Anthony Colle
profile: Enthusiastic Software Developer with a background in Digital Marketing, including SEO, UX and Big Data analysis.
Holding a Higher Diploma in Computer Science in Software Development (1st Class Honours) at National College of Ireland.
In-depth knowledge of the Modern Web Full Stack, including React.js, Angular, Node.js, Express.js and MongoDB.
Strong skills in Java, RESTful APIs architecture, HTML/CSS/JavaScript (+TypeScript), SQL, PL/SQL, UNIX Scripting, Python, R and version control tool Git.

skills.name: React.js
skills.description: Designed and developed user-friendly Single Page Applications using the React library and tools like Redux and Client Routing, as well as the latest features such as Hooks and Context.

skills.name: Node.js, Express.js & MongoDB
skills.description: Developed multiple applications using this stack including a secure REST API for CRUD operations, a Weather Forecast application using a 3rd Party API, and a live Web Chat application implementing WebSocket.

education.degree: Higher Diploma in Computer Sciences (Software Development)
education.modules: Software Development (95%), Introduction to Databases (83%), Web Design (92%), Architecture, OS & Network (80%), Object-Oriented Software Engineering (78%), Data Structures & Algorithms (74%), Web Services & API Development (67%), Server Side Development (70%) and Advanced Programming (84%), Project (74%)
